document.full_text: children at more than 1,700 schools, from gritty new orleans to the wilds of british columbia, unite in music on monday, when for a single moment across time zones they will all perform the same song.
document.title: children across continent to perform song simultaneously
lines_and_colors: children at more than 1,700 schools, from gritty new orleans to the wilds of british columbia, unite in music on monday, when for a single moment across time zones they will all perform the same song.
